meanings.definition: The process of treating something with ozone.
meanings.sent1: The ozonations of the water helped remove impurities.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ozonations to clean the air in laboratories.
meanings.sent3: The ozonations of the fruit made it taste like a fresh breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as the ozonations after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The ozonations of the room made it feel like a breath of fresh air.

meanings.definition: The act of purifying or disinfecting with ozone.
meanings.sent1: The ozonations of the medical equipment ensured it was sterile.
meanings.sent2: Ozonations are commonly used in wastewater treatment plants.
meanings.sent3: The ozonations of the gym shoes made them smell like a pine forest.
meanings.sent4: His words had the cleansing effect of ozonations on a polluted city.
meanings.sent5: The ozonations of the air made it feel pure and invigorating.
